installCommand: export HOME=/root CARGO_HOME=/root/.cargo RUSTUP_HOME=/root/.rustup NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false; curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh -s -- -y; . /root/.cargo/env; (cd ../shogi-core && npx --yes wasm-pack build --release); npm ci --include=dev || npm install --include=dev
